## Overview

This page contains README's and internal lab documentation on how to contribute to the Meshinchi Lab and Locatelli lab github organizations. Be sure to have the software requirements installed in order to use this guide.  
:::


## Software

We will be using R and Python. You can either

-   have **R and Rstudio** installed on your laptop
-   or, use **Posit cloud** (formerly Rstudio Cloud).

[Posit cloud](https://posit.cloud) is free of charge for personal users, yet you need to [sign up](https://posit.cloud/plans/free) for a new user account and have internet connection.

-   **Python** installed on your laptop
-   **Quarto** installed on your laptop
